title: Definitions
context: [ยง88D-1] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context clearly indicates otherwise: &ldquo;Employee&rdquo; shall have the same meaning as defined in section 76-11. &ldquo;Jurisdiction&rdquo; shall have the same meaning as defined in section 76-11. &ldquo;Special pay plan&rdquo; means a governmental retirement plan that meets the requirements of sections 401(a) and 414(d) of the Internal Revenue Code, and which may be a qualified pick-up plan under section 414(h)(2) of the Internal Revenue Code. [L 2003, c 109, pt of ยง2]
